content:
Hello,

I would like to show my personnal lean project to paris france people. Where should I post. I do not fell they like it there.
If you are specifically targeting the Paris people, then #Geographic locality > Paris area, France
Oh, I see you have already posted there. You can share it here (in public in this #general stream). Unless you are trying to keep it private, but if so, you should explain your situation.
